description: Try our easy to follow Strawberry Shortcakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Strawberry Shortcakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line baking tray with baking paper. Sift flour into a bowl. Add 1/4 cup of the caster sugar and stir until combined. Add butter and, using your fingertips, rub into flour mixture until it resembles fine breadcrumbs.

Whisk egg yolks and milk in a bowl and add to flour mixture. Using a flat-blade knife, quickly stir mixture until a soft dough forms. Turn out onto a lightly floured surface and knead into a 1.5cm-thick disc. Uisng a 9.5cm-round biscuit cutter, cut 6 rounds from dough and place on tray.
In a clean bowl, lightly whisk egg whites. Brush over shortcakes and sprinkle with remaining caster sugar. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a wire rack to cool.
Place shortcakes onto serving plates. Spoon strawberries onto cakes, reserving the juice. Top with cream and reserved juice. Serve.
